item.title: Spring Framework Tutorials(1)
item.description: What is Dependency Injection? loose coupling (tight coupling) is means one object is not totally depend upon another object. Spring container/IoC container can Creating objects and then injecting them to your class. In spring, Ioc container is responsible to inject the dependencies, we provide meta-data to it by XML or annotation. For example, they are getting connected: class Laptop{ @Autowired HardDrive obj1; } @Component class HitachHD implements HardDrive{ ...... } you just need to implement dependency injection so that you can test and maintain better.
